FuncDef: This command configures an ISID value or a range of ISID values to be matched by the mac-filter parent. The pbb-etype value for the related SAP (inherited from the ethernet port configuration) or for the related SDP binding (inherited from SDP configuration) will be used to identify the ISID tag.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ISID value, 24 bits as a decimal integer. When just one present identifies a specific ISID to be used for matching. Values-0 to 16777215.
Identifies a range of ISIDs to be used as matching criteria.
